1.title: The awakening
1.plot: A steampunk spaceship in the depths of an unknown galaxy just escaped from his enemies thanks to a space Jump. But it seems the jump also replaced the legendary capitain T-Bone by his double from another dimension : Thierry, a loser from our 21st century Earth, who really doesn't know what is going on. Recognized as an intruder, he is put in jail, as the crew has to deal with multiple oxygen leaks and the arrival of several enemy fighters.

2.title: This is not Sparta
2.plot: Carlo, the spaceship's scientist on board, managed to do another space jump in order to escape to enemies. If Thierry is still there, GunSerge, the fighter of the Zeppelin Star, has been replaced by his double from another dimension: Leonidas, king of Sparta. As Kara, the pilot of the spaceship immediately fainted, and as Thierry is still in Jail, Carlo has to deal alone with the antique warrior.

3.title: Elementary, my dear Kara
3.plot: After Thierry managed to escape and to defeat Leonidas, Carlo launches a new leap. This time, he is the one who is replaced, and his double is Sherlock Holmes. Thanks to his incredible deductive skills, he manages to be accepted by the crew of the Zeppelin Star. In the same time, Thierry is released, considered as "useless so harmless" by Kara and GunSerge.

4.title: Choose your own death
4.plot: The terrible and totally crazy commander Dolph Acid Meïster has found the zeppelin star. He is the leader of the Elypsis, the mysterious pursuers of our heroes, and helped by Jérôme Ducreux, his unbearable switchboard operator, he intends to capture them. Not to mention Sherlock's manipulative genius.

5.title: Space bored
5.plot: Sherlock managed to launch a new leap, living Acid Meïster and his terrible army light years away. Thanks it, Carlo is back, and Douchebag has been replaced by his evil twin. "But as he is evil, his evil twin is super sweet". Far too sweet. And the crew has to wait 36 hours before the next jump.

6.title: Living dead or alive
6.plot: After the last space jump, Kara has been replaced by a zombie . While the crew just managed to lock her up on the cockpit of the Zeppelin Star, Acid Meïster reappears . Convinced that Kara just tries to make fun of him, he decides to destroy them when a mysterious superior called the High Templar remembers Acid his mission : bring them back alive.

7.title: The torpedo of the living dead
7.plot: The crazy and terrible Dolph Acid Meïster just launched hundreds of space fighters against the Zeppelin Star. While Kara has been turned to a zombie, Thierry tries to pilot the ship. In the meantime, Carlo and the Douchebag try to find the way to destroy Meïster and his army with an empty torpedo, a rat and a zombie.

imdb.plot outline: Lost in the deepest part of space, the over-excited crew of a ship is trying to escape from a mad and dangerous enemy. It would be less of a pain if each member was not replaced in turn by his double from another dimension, from Sherlock Holmes to the king of Sparta Leonidas via a zombie. - The captain is replaced by a loser from our planet. Will he succeed in getting accepted and saving them all?
imdb.title: Zeppelin Star
plot: Lost in the deepest part of space, the over-excited crew of a ship is trying to escape from a mad and dangerous enemy. It would be less of a pain if each member was not replaced in turn by his double from another dimension, from Sherlock Holmes to the king of Sparta Leonidas via a zombie. - The captain is replaced by a loser from our planet. Will he succeed in getting accepted and saving them all?
